# [Interview #972: AMOL Signing Report - JaimieKrycho, Entry #14](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=972#14)

#### Question

Will there ever be a WoT TV series?

#### Brandon Sanderson

The rights are owned by Universal Pictures and they are developing an
*Eye of the World*
feature film.
